snippet: Alex Rodriguez sued Major League Baseball, accusing it of buying the cooperation of Anthony Bosch, the head of an anti-aging clinic at the center of a doping scanda.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez sued Major League Baseball, accusing it of buying the cooperation of Anthony Bosch, the head of an anti-aging clinic at the center of a doping scanda.

headline.seo: Alex Rodriguez’s Lawsuit Against Major League Baseball
headline.main: Alex Rodriguez’s Lawsuit Against Major League Baseball
